translation.bug: Pakkakkasa pattulung makkapala pappadannaro iyanaritu riteppu mnemonik.
translation.en: Such memorization aids are called mnemonics.

translation.bug: Purana mate Gish ri taung sisebbu asera ratuna tellu pulo tellu(1993), makkumpulu dui,wi universitas,e maelo palloppoi onrong memorabilianna Gish,kenang kenangan penghargaan fole onronna Gish
translation.en: Following Gish's 1993 death, the University raised funds to enlarge its gallery to display memorabilia received from Gish's estate.

translation.bug: Restorang e we mancaji onroang manre mattette' i laoi ko tollao bandung. Pakkanreanna mappanyameng lilla anre sunda, iyye onroang manrewe lai patettong pake modele lego-lego okko laleng bola-bola e we yare'ga lai yaggolilingi okko ale' na bulu e mega na laibelloi okko to-to aju makkampe' e sibawa lai pasennangi ki' okko oni wae salo e napancaji wi anre ta' maka nyameng. Parellu lai coba lao nigi-nigi tau lao okko bandung.
translation.en: This restaurant is the prime culinary destination if you're going to Bandung. Aside from the exceptionally delicious Sundanese menu, this restaurant is also built on the basis of a relaxing meal time in a saung surrounded by the woods and mountains accompanied by shady trees and splashing sounds of river water, giving you an all-around impressive culinary experience.  Must-try for anyone visiting Bandung.

translation.bug: Konvensional lattu paccobang nenniya aplikasi iya massisumpureng massamang na mallaing llaing, mulanna pole pallebbangeng fisika asseddingeng konvesional lattu addeppereng iya mattongeng tongeng silalona e iya sisompungeng  arrakikeng-ale molekuler, pole pallebbangeng material silalona e sibawa dimensi skalanano lattu mitaitai metteru materi skala atom.
translation.en: The associated research and applications are equally diverse, ranging from extensions of conventional device physics to completely new approaches based upon molecular self-assembly, from developing new materials with dimensions on the nanoscale to direct control of matter on the atomic scale.

translation.bug: Namuni, anggota pabanuang mabela lebbi mabeccu nulle ripasiita siare tau macca lao riyaseng anre GM amang.
translation.en: Nonetheless, members of the public are much less likely than scientists to perceive GM foods as safe.

translation.bug: Sipada sibawa yae maega pendukunna transhumanis makkedda, sipada Dan Agin, makkitai lao kritikus transhumanisme, ri kanan nenniya rikiri politik sippadapadang sebage "biokonservatif" iyaregga "bioluddites" istilah cappa yae lao pada herakan sosial anti - industrialisasi aba' ke-19 yae mapasisala pasulleang pajama manual taue sibawa mesina.
translation.en: In keeping with this, many prominent transhumanist advocates, such as Dan Agin, refer to transhumanism's critics, on the political right and left jointly, as "bioconservatives" or "bioluddites", the latter term alluding to the 19th century anti-industrialisation social movement that opposed the replacement of human manual labourers by machines.

translation.bug: Alarapang yya paccappurengnge nulle bentu keedo cayyaana.
translation.en: An example of the latter might be the radiation reaction force.

translation.bug: pada Alena mabbiasai mappassa mabbukka sumpang tama'na kerajaangnge, namuni pada Alena maderi riakkegunang pole ri renringnge nasibawai taccedde efeknya
translation.en: They were used to force open the castle gates, although they were sometimes used against walls with less effect.

translation.bug: Saraf massulu’ e materru pole ota’ diaseng saraf kranial, sedangkan yae ro massulu’ e pole sumsum buku boko diaseng saraf buku boko.
translation.en: Nerves that exit directly from the brain are called cranial nerves while those exiting from the spinal cord are called spinal nerves.

translation.bug: Yae nadistorsi elli pasa pole daya tanetenna nenniya sipada yae maturu' nipoleang ceddena investasi rilaleng aset taneteta ro.
translation.en: This distorts market pricing of natural resources and at the same time leads to underinvestment in our natural assets.

translation.bug: Sippada sistem yae, yamaneng spesies yareng dua aseng, seddi genusna nenniya seddi pi untu' spesiesnya.
translation.en: Based on this system, each species is given two names, one for its genus and another for its species.

translation.bug: Iyyaero iyanaritu teore loppo pammulang iyya ripannessai nasaba ripake komputer'e.
translation.en: It was the first major theorem to be proved using a computer.

translation.bug: Penerbitang bobbo’ teksna Alfred Kroeber Anthropology (1923) mattanrai titik balikna ro antropologi Amerika.
translation.en: The publication of Alfred Kroeber's textbook Anthropology (1923) marked a turning point in American anthropology.

translation.bug: Appasilolongeng laingnge mallebbangi iyamatero kriti e (massalaingeng) ri teori politi liberal iyae ri ebbu ole Michael Walzer, Michael nennia Charles Taylor.
translation.en: Another debate developed around the (distinct) criticisms of liberal political theory made by Michael Walzer, Michael Sandel and Charles Taylor.

translation.bug: The ugly American (1963) iyanaritu  pelleng pammulanna
translation.en: The Ugly American (1963) was the first of these films.

translation.bug: Alena makketo tau insinyur mesina iya maccae nenniya fisikawan marisseng.
translation.en: He was also a capable mechanical engineer and an eminent physicist.

translation.bug: Pengubah Richard Wagner nasadari tipu muslihat pole ri maega disiplin rilaleng seddi opera, nacontokan'e I siklus Der Ring des Nibelungen (“The Ring of the Nibelung”).
translation.en: The composer Richard Wagner recognized the fusion of so many disciplines into a single work of opera, exemplified by his cycle Der Ring des Nibelungen ("The Ring of the Nibelung").

translation.bug: Idi' maneng massumpulololaiyakkattai pirasai manre okko iyye onroang manrewe pada sarang iya maneng kacana na lai sampoi okko takke-takke maddekke e. Masoli', dega padana, makanja' ladde na anre-anrena malunra to.
translation.en: Our family made time to try eating in this restaurant which looked like a nest with all the vining brances closing all their windows. It was exotic, unique, very cool, and the food was also excellent.

translation.bug: Garnisun masolie sibawa assabarengnna maderi mabeccu naekia Iyyaro kerajaang'e parellu
translation.en: Garrisons were expensive and as a result often small unless the castle was important.

translation.bug: Tedong: Samrupa iyanaritu sewwai tedong wassele kloning iya mamulang ri linoe.
translation.en: Water buffalo: Samrupa was the first cloned water buffalo.

translation.bug: Biara akademik sirupae diakkebbu ri Queen's College, Oxford  ri taung  1140, na naulle dirancangi pole Reginald Ely.
translation.en: A similar kind of academic cloister was created at Queen's College, Oxford in the 1140s, likely designed by Reginald Ely.

translation.bug: Seddi mobile robot moderen, wettunna riwarengi onrong iya mabbeccu e, statis, nenniya riita, nullei malomo ripatentu orongna sibawa napakkota' kota' onrongna; namuni, onrongna dinamis, pappadanna (rilaleng endoskopi) bageang rilaleng watakkalena makkenyawana pasien e, napamompo i tantangan kaminang maloppo.
translation.en: A modern mobile robot, when given a small, static, and visible environment, can easily determine its location and map its environment; however, dynamic environments, such as (in endoscopy) the interior of a patient's breathing body, pose a greater challenge.

translation.bug: puraana Perang Dunia 2, engkangenna appinrengeng napancajiwi maega abbolaangeng riwiring kota Amerika.
translation.en: After World War II, availability of FHA loans stimulated a housing boom in American suburbs.

translation.bug: Mauni, matematika napurani makkacuwe ri pallebangeng naekiya de’na ri pallebangngi  ri ahli Matematika’e Thomas Harriot pammulangna ri taung 1589.
translation.en: However, the mathematics involved were developed but never published by mathematician Thomas Harriot starting around 1589.

translation.bug: Iyya passaleng e muttama'i  pelestariang ade' nenniya bahasa, hak tana, appunnangeng neniya eksploitasi sumber daya alam, appatentukeng politi, nenniyya otonomi, degradasi abbanuang nenniya serangang, akkasi-asingeng, addisingeng, neniya diskriminasi.
translation.en: These issues include cultural and linguistic preservation, land rights, ownership and exploitation of natural resources, political determination and autonomy, environmental degradation and incursion, poverty, health, and discrimination.

translation.bug: nappakku iyye pura sellei kartu solangku, tapi tette' moi de' gaga sinyal na
translation.en: I just replaced my broken card, but there's still no signal

translation.bug: Massamangngi pelleng biografis dokumenter.e, pelleng Holywood mappancaji toi maega pelleng komersial iyya ripalole RI akkatuongenna tau Macahoro.e
translation.en: Along with documentary biographical films, Hollywood produced numerous commercial films based on the lives of famous people.

translation.bug: Filsuf modereng pamminasae termasu'  Spinoza, Leibniz, Locke, Berkeley, Hume, sibawa Kant.
translation.en: Major modern philosophers include Spinoza, Leibniz, Locke, Berkeley, Hume, and Kant.

translation.bug: Sipungenna carana sumange’e mecawe’ pole carana watangkale’e, appaunna paddissengeng alang’e napassedianganggngi seua-seua engka akkattana paddissengenge.
translation.en: Since mental processes are intimately related to bodily processes, the descriptions that the natural sciences furnish of human beings play an important role in the philosophy of mind.

translation.bug: Persaratang kemitraan riatoro ri assijancingeng kemitraan narekko riebbu, nenniyya sesa ri bicara yurisdiksi abbanuang kemitraan engka.
translation.en: The terms of a partnership are partly governed by a partnership agreement if one is created, and partly by the law of the jurisdiction where the partnership is located.

translation.bug: Alena napalebangngi jamang Hipparchus , carana sistem  grid ri petana sibawa na adopsi lampe 56,5 mil gelarna.
translation.en: He extended the work of Hipparchus, using a grid system on his maps and adopting a length of 56.5 miles for a degree.

translation.bug: Seuwa wettu abad seppulo arua sibawa seppulo asera , geografi riakuini matunru akademis iyyae rita, nennia mancaji bagiang pole kurikulum universitas di eropa (khususna Paris nennia Berlin).
translation.en: The 18th and the 19th centuries were the times when geography became recognized as a discrete academic discipline, and became part of a typical university curriculum in Europe (especially Paris and Berlin).

translation.bug: Iyyae prosesna wedding mopa matteru lattu alel na metette' nenniya yemaneng populasi e mabbere fenotipe ya lebbi makessing watakkalena.
translation.en: This process can continue until the allele is fixed and the entire population shares the fitter phenotype.

translation.bug: Placeholder Babilonia tennia noolo sitongenna nasaba yaro ripakkeguna aleaaalemi, dee to ripakei ri paccappurena angke'e.
translation.en: The Babylonian placeholder was not a true zero because it was not used alone, nor was it used at the end of a number.

translation.bug: Rilaleng artikelna, Jared Bernstein, Sibawanna Senior ri Pusa'na Anggaran nenniya Amadecengeng, mappakkutana pallolongeng iya mellebbang e narekko otomatisasi, nenniya lebbi maluang pi, appallebbangeng teknologi, utamana massumbang lao passaleng pasa tau pajjama iya mallebange.
translation.en: In his article, Jared Bernstein, a Senior Fellow at the Center on Budget and Policy Priorities, questions the widespread idea that automation, and more broadly, technological advances, have mainly contributed to this growing labor market problem.

translation.bug: Etnografi iyyanaritu karya ruki tentang siare tau, ri onrong nennia wettu tertentu.
translation.en: An ethnography is a piece of writing about a people, at a particular place and time.
